name: Getsubtitle

screenshots.caption: Right click on the movie file
Search and download subtitle from opensubtitles.org

short_description:
Small program to search and download subtitles from opensubtitles.org. 
Based on library XmlRpcCs (http://xmlrpccs.sourceforge.net/)

Usage (from windows explorer): 
1) right click on the file you want to download subtitles 
2) click on "download subtitles from opensubtitle.org"
3) select the language 
4) press search 
5) double click on the subtitle to download

Prerequisites to Build: 
MS Visual Studio (2013)

To install by hand (from a command prompt window with administrator rights):
getsubtitle.exe -install (or) -unistall 

Otherwise download getsubtitlesetup.exe.
summary: Search and download subtitles from opensubtitles.org
